sections.title: Buttons
description: Buttons extend the `%btn` placeholder. They create base styles for `03_collections/_btngroups.scss`.

sections.title: Headings
description: Modify `h1` - `h6` standalones (ie. not part of a `collection`). Use format `.heading.-class`. For headings as parts of `collections` use `collection__heading`.

sections.title: Icons
description: Icons rely on the `sprite($file_name)` mixin in `02_bits/_utils.scss`. Variable names are determined by svg files in `src/icons/`.
